info.name: ChatBot API (team 1)
info.description: This is documentation for first team API. If you see "/admin" in request route it means you need to put in headers value of telegram_id with user that is admin, write now this is user with telegram_id 1, so you need key: "X-User-id", value: "1". All info that you need to use this API you will find below.

item.name: User

response.name: user not found
response.body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

		  }
		</style>
    </head>
    <body>
        <iframe src="//www.herokucdn.com/error-pages/application-error.html"></iframe>
    </body>
</html>

item.description:
This is CRUD communication for user table. If the request need to specify some parameter to do something with user it's doing as Path Variable, you can also see how to add user "step" in Create user example, it's doing by the same way in user update.
Most of the examples show the successful response and not, the second one could be if there is no such user or your parameters are wrong.

header.description: telegramId of user with type role admin or superadmin
